Phase59OutsideSubzoneHeader: Search for your allies in the Caldeum Imperial Palace
Phase59Description: With Duriel defeated I can now search for my allies in Caldeum palace.
Name: Turning the Tide
Toast: Search for the Gates of Hell
Phase58Description: Lorath, Donan and Neyrelle didn't waste any time and are searching for tomes about Burning Hells. I should aid them.
BreadcrumbDescription: I can't believe one of the demons unleashed on Caldeum by Lilith was Duriel, Lord of Pain. There's no time to waste, together with Horadrim we must make our way to put an end to Lilith's plan - no matter where it takes us.
Phase58OutsideSubzoneHeader: Follow Neyrelle to the other Horadrim in the Caldeum Imperial Palace
Callback72Header: Search for your allies in the Imperial Palace
Phase56Description: Now that we know where lies Cathedral of Hatred where Mephisto's essence is reforming, we can stop Lilith's plan. The Gates of Hell lie nearby - this is our goal.
Phase56OutsideSubzoneHeader: Inspect Blood Petals at the Gates of Hell
Phase104Description: Lorath, Donan and Neyrelle didn't waste any time and are searching for tomes for information about the Burning Hells. I should aid them.
Phase57OutsideSubzoneHeader: Descend to the Gates of Hell beneath Caldeum
Callback68Header: Descend to the Gates of Hell with your allies
Phase57Description: Now that we know where lies the Cathedral of Hatred where Mephisto's essence is reforming, we can stop Lilith's plan. The Gates of Hell are nearby - this is our goal.
